text: Vaka 3.21 Mt 19.28, Lu 22.30, 2 Ti 2.12, CHL 2.26-27 viaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lagulama vɨhɨlɨ lɨvala iadɨ Iavaŋ dɨ mɨgahɨnihɨni hɨsɨŋ uvɨ heŋ nɨbu hula mɨgahɨnimin aba abi aba abɨha aba abi uami. Hulaŋ mu vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lagulama vɨhɨlɨ lɨvalavɨla ha nɨbu avi viaŋ hula iadɨ mɨgahɨnihɨni hɨsɨŋ uvɨ heŋ mɨgahɨnibali aba abi aba abɨha aba abi uami.
